data.text:
This girl's particularly hard to please. 
Total opposite of you, eh? Trainer-chan!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>This girl's particularly hard to please. 
<story>Total opposite of you, eh? Trainer-chan!

data.text: We're watching videos of Umamusume running that Transcend filmed. She's adding extra info that you can't grasp just from seeing them run.
data.processed: We're watching videos of Umamusume running that Transcend filmed. She's adding extra info that you can't grasp just from seeing them run.

data.text:
What do you think of their running styles? 
Anything caught you eye?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>What do you think of their running styles? 
<story>Anything caught you eye?

data.text: She restarts the race footage.
data.processed: <story>She restarts the race footage.

data.text:
They all seem to have mastered the fundamentals. 
Their starts are good, too. No problems there.
data.processed:
<story>They all seem to have mastered the fundamentals. 
<story>Their starts are good, too. No problems there.

data.text:
I agree. Then, it's gonna come down to 
their personalities, eh?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I agree. Then, it's gonna come down to 
<story>their personalities, eh?

data.text: Something's missing and I can't put my finger on it....
data.processed: <story>Something's missing and I can't put my finger on it....

data.text: Transcend has shown me a lot of different girls, but none of them made me think "This is the one!"
data.processed: Transcend has shown me a lot of different girls, but none of them made me think "This is the one!"

data.text:
Of course, they're all fantastic and a great display of skill in 
running. And yet... None of them have that "something..."
data.processed:
<story>Of course, they're all fantastic and a great display of skill in 
<story>running. And yet... None of them have that "something..."

data.text: I don't get it. I guess it's a me problem then... I better find out what it is—
data.processed: I don't get it. I guess it's a me problem then... I better find out what it is—

data.text:
Oh, here's Wonder Acute! 
They're about to start, so pay attention!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oh, here's Wonder Acute! 
<story>They're about to start, so pay attention!

data.text:
Wah, Acute is here, too? She's been doing really well... 
And with all those trainers looking... I'm so nervous...
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Wah, Acute is here, too? She's been doing really well... 
<story>And with all those trainers looking... I'm so nervous...

data.text:
Maybe it's better not to aim for first... It might end poorly. 
I want to be in the top 5 at least, that's easier.
data.name: Umamusume B
data.processed:
<story>Maybe it's better not to aim for first... It might end poorly. 
<story>I want to be in the top 5 at least, that's easier.

data.text:
Giving it your all and then falling off at the end would be painful. 
—In the midst of watching these girls discuss their strategies, 
a thought appeared in my mind.

choices.text: What's your strategy for running, Transcend?

data.processed:
<story>Giving it your all and then falling off at the end would be painful. 
<story>—In the midst of watching these girls discuss their strategies, 
<story>a thought appeared in my mind.

data.text: Wha... Me?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Wha... Me?

data.text:
Hmm... Well, I think you shouldn't just be running 
for the sake of showing off... I guess?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm... Well, I think you shouldn't just be running 
<story>for the sake of showing off... I guess?

data.text:
The point of racing is to beat the others. 
You should be running to the point you might stumble.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>The point of racing is to beat the others. 
<story>You should be running to the point you might stumble.

data.text:
Ahaha, not like I'd actually. But really though, if you run 
safely because you want to look nice... It'd be a bit—
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, not like I'd actually. But really though, if you run 
<story>safely because you want to look nice... It'd be a bit—

data.text:
It seems like my words connected with her. 
I startled her for a bit, but then she smiled back.
data.processed:
<story>It seems like my words connected with her. 
<story>I startled her for a bit, but then she smiled back.

data.text: ... Yes, exactly. It'd be boring.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>... Yes, exactly. It'd be boring.

data.text:
Just aiming for top 5 isn't enough. 
Even going for first...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Just aiming for top 5 isn't enough. 
<story>Even going for first...

data.text: I want something more...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I want something more...

data.text: I want to feel the thrill of running.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I want to feel the thrill of running.

data.text: Whaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Whaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Geh! Hah... Nguh...! 
Hah... Hah... Come on!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Geh! Hah... Nguh...! 
<story>Hah... Hah... Come on!

data.text:
Hah, hah...! 
Gotta exceed... expectations!!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hah, hah...! 
<story>Gotta exceed... expectations!!

data.text: Kuuuuh!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Kuuuuh!

data.text:
... This was supposed to be a mere stroll at dusk. 
When I got to the vantage point, I noticed a girl 
I didn't recognize. Her body and voice are shivering.
data.processed:
<story>... This was supposed to be a mere stroll at dusk. 
<story>When I got to the vantage point, I noticed a girl 
<story>I didn't recognize. Her body and voice are shivering.

data.text: I couldn't help but feel worried. She looked like she ran almost too much. She's covered in sweat and barely able to stand up straight.
data.processed: I couldn't help but feel worried. She looked like she ran almost too much. She's covered in sweat and barely able to stand up straight.

data.text:
Yeah, sorry about just now. Did I make you worried? 
Thanks for keeping an eye out for me.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, sorry about just now. Did I make you worried? 
<story>Thanks for keeping an eye out for me.

data.text:
She's smiling at me as if nothing happened. 
As if she had merely pulled my leg.
data.processed:
<story>She's smiling at me as if nothing happened. 
<story>As if she had merely pulled my leg.

data.text: Hmm? You seem frustrated. What's the matter?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Hmm? You seem frustrated. What's the matter?

data.text:
Back then...? Ah... You heard me? 
Actually, it's my bad for thinking out loud.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Back then...? Ah... You heard me? 
<story>Actually, it's my bad for thinking out loud.

data.text:
I'm sooo embarrased. 
You could've stayed silent you know, Trainer-chan.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I'm sooo embarrased. 
<story>You could've stayed silent you know, Trainer-chan.

data.text:
It's not that I didn't want to hear it. Rather, I want 
to tell her that her actions have consequences.
data.processed:
<story>It's not that I didn't want to hear it. Rather, I want 
<story>to tell her that her actions have consequences.

data.text:
She probably already knows, anyway. 
Still,
data.processed:
<story>She probably already knows, anyway. 
<story>Still,

data.text: Trainer-chan?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Trainer-chan?

data.text: I just want to have fun, y'know.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I just want to have fun, y'know.
